promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute special bird electric-type pokemon wearing lightning-charged gemstones. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltlejewel, a a chibi cute special bird electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Electric Surfer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "electric" or "Voltlejewel". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, bird-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This neon-winged cutie glides through urban skies, skillfully navigating magnetic fields. Its Electric Surfer ability makes it a beloved city-dweller.
